deck.paragraph: At Gateway you will find that church is far more than a weekly gathering. Having said that, our Sunday morning worship service is the focal point of our church life and is our main weekly event.

right.deck: In this current season, we meet together online every Sunday at 10:40am for worship and teaching. Join us at: [youtube.com/gatewaychurchyork](https://www.youtube.com/gatewaychurchyork). A limited number of people are now able to attend our worship services in person at the Gateway Centre. Places do need to be booked in advance.  If you would like to join us, please contact us via office@gatewaychurch.co.uk to book a place. Weâ€™d love to meet you here.

left.deck: All our sermons are recorded and can be found on the [Words](https://www.gatewaychurch.co.uk/words) page. Once a month we have a Welcome Lunch where we invite newcomers to the church to a lunch at a church family's home.
